title: Road to Home
description: When he gets a phone call late at night, Mihi expects it to be his husband, Rafi, calling to say he is finally home. What he gets instead is a nightmare: Rafi's mission has failed. Despite orders from Rafi that he is not to come after him, Mihi heads to Europe to find his missing husband. But rescuing Rafi, and getting them both back home, may be the one assignment he'll never complete â€¦
author: Mell Eight
